Admin Officer Job at Excel and Grace Consulting




        
    

        
        Excel and Grace Consulting is a fast-paced business consulting organization with a track record of delivering exceptional business solutions to small and medium-scale enterprises in Nigeria, Ghana, Germany, Switzerland, Canada, etc. We are certified management consultants with the International Council of Management Consulting Institutes (CMC-Global) with over 18 years of experience. Our team of experts and consultants have authored over 20 books on business management, business structure, business operations, human resources, organizational structure, employee development, money management, and so on.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Admin Officer
     

            
    



Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Admin Officer will oversee daily administrative operations, ensuring smooth office management and support for grooming, retail, and distribution teams.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage office operations, records, and documentation
	Coordinate schedules, meetings, and correspondence
	Handle vendor management and office supplies
	Support HR and management with administrative tasks
	Ensure a well-organized and efficient work environment
	Assist with compliance and internal controls


Requirements


	B.Sc./HND in Business Administration or related field with 2–4 years of experience in an administrative role
	Strong communication and organizational skills
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office tools
	Ability to multitask and work independently.


Salary
N200,000 / Month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: eandg.tprecruiters@gmail.com using "Admin Officer -  Ebute Metta, Lagos" as the subject of the email.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Marketing Officer
Job Location: Remote

Job Summary 
     

            
    




	This is a full-time role for a professional with a strong background in digital marketing and brand management.
	You will be responsible for developing and executing marketing initiatives and SEO to drive traffic and strengthen brand presence across multiple platforms.
	You will also provide guidance to senior leaders, leveraging data and insights to shape the future of our digital footprints.


Key Responsibilities & Duties
Collaboration:


	Collaborate with senior leaders, marketing and communications peers to identify opportunities, set performance KPIs, and report on the ROI of all campaigns.
	Collaborate cross-functionally to ensure high-impact campaign delivery.
	Establish and enforce scalable workflows, RACIs, and quality bars to ensure speed, control, and consistency across teams and vendors.


Digital Marketing & Analytics:


	Maintain analytics across social and digital platforms to track user behavior, churn rates, campaign performance, and optimize budget allocation based on data-driven insights.
	Support software development and management, as required
	As required, and in partnership with IT and communications / marketing peers, integrate and manage all 3rd-party tools to create a seamless user experience.


Campaign Management & Execution:


	Plan and execute integrated marketing campaigns for promotions and service initiatives .
	Create and manage marketing budgets to ensure efficient resource allocation across all channels.
	Develop digital requirements for events, advertising, campaigns and outreach initiatives.


Reporting & Optimization:


	Work with the operations and IT Managers, deliver (at least) monthly performance reports on key metrics such as website traffic, churn rates, adoption rates, lead generation, advertising ROI, and social media engagement.
	Continuously analyze data to refine, optimize, and scale all marketing campaigns/efforte for maximum impact and efficiency.
	Maintain brand consistency across all channels and ensure aligned messaging.


Who you are


	2+ years of proven work experience in growth marketing and/or mobility advertising
	Possesses the ability to get things done with constantly changing priorities, deadlines, and projects
	You can operate as a team player/coach if needed, and be a resource on the marketing team
	Familiar with managing complex and/or cross-functional projects from inception to execution
	Flexibility to travel 15% of the time.


Salary
N100,000 / month

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: fravingsconsulting@outlook.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Women are encouraged to apply.

title: Customer Service Executive Job at Future Moves Recruitment Agency
content:
Future Moves Recruitment Agency is a licensed full-fledged Human Resource firm with extensive expertise and experience in human Capital development and staffing. Future Moves has exceptional expertise in Talent Sourcing, learning & development, talent management, HR Outsourcing & Payrolling, HR planning & Consulting, Policy Drafting, Culture Change and Organisation Effectiveness by designing and implementing interventions which identify the core areas of development to enhance the overall growth and competitiveness of your organization.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Service Executive

Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
     

            
    



Job Description


	The Customer Service Executive will be responsible for managing customer interactions, handling inquiries, and ensuring excellent service delivery across all customer touchpoints, including social media platforms.
	The ideal candidate should be customer-focused, proactive, and digitally savvy.


Key Responsibilities


	Respond to customer inquiries and complaints promptly and professionally
	Manage customer engagement across social media and other communication channels
	Maintain accurate records of customer interactions
	Follow up with customers to ensure satisfaction and issue resolution
	Collaborate with internal teams to improve service delivery
	Uphold company standards and customer service policies


Requirements


	Minimum of 2 years of hands-on experience in a customer service role
	Social media savvy with experience handling online customer engagement
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Strong problem-solving and organizational abilities
	Ability to work under minimal supervision.


Salary
N200,000 monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: babayemitemitope6@gmail.com using "Customer Service Executive" as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

	The Confidential Secretary will provide high-level administrative and secretarial support, manage confidential information, coordinate schedules, and ensure effective communication within and outside the organization.

	Provide confidential secretarial and administrative support to management.

	Strong organisational, time management, and multitasking abilities.
	High level of integrity, professionalism, and confidentiality.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook).
	Ability to work independently with minimal supervision.


Benefits


	Competitive Salary: N130,000 - N150,000 / month
	Supportive and professional work environment
	Opportunity for career growth and skill development
	HMO upon confirmation.
